Lab 2: Intro to Haply

Home Improvisation

I enjoy both jazz and assembling Ikea furniture, so I had a blast putting the Haply together. I could tell right away that the tool provided was not going to cut it torque-wise, but fortunately I was able to find the right size screwdriver in my partner’s toolbox.

“Hello Wall!”
